channel.title: Project Rajiscape
channel.description:
Welcome to Project Rajiscape topic. I decided im going to try and make 1 of the best servers in the community! How can you help? But filling in either 1 of these applications.
========================== Table of Contents 1. Forum Manager Application 2. Coding Application 3. Host Application ==========================
Forum Manager Application ---------------------------- Will you make a successful forums based on rajiscape and moparscape community?:
Will you try and make the forums active as possible?:
Whats your experience with forums?:
----------------------------
Coding Application --------------------------- Will you be an active coder when rajiscape server?:
Will you try and make server better then just play it all the time?:
whats your experience in coding:
----------------------------
Hoster Application ---------------------------- Will you turn on the server when I am not around?:
Will you be able to do tasks when asked?:
Whats your experience with servers:
----------------------------
[b]( Please have at least some experience with any of these 3 before appying).[/b]
Please note aslo: I am online on my server If you would like to see it join hamachi network Rajiscape2 pass: 123 ~Raji knight
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[b]STAFF[/b]
Hosters: Raji knight
Coders:
Forum Managers: Zanzibar

item.title: Project Rajiscape
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Mopar69 Mod Mopar69
item.description:
@Mod_Mopar69 wrote:

Will you make a successful forums based on rajiscape and moparscape community?:HELL YEA

Will you try and make the forums active as possible?:YEP

Whats your experience with forums?:ive been making fourms for about a year now and i know alot of things i can also make a chatbox if you want =)

Read full topic

item.title: Project Rajiscape
item.dc:creator: @Ruppich Ruppich
item.description:
@Ruppich wrote:

Will you be an active coder when rajiscape server?: Yeah, I think so

Will you try and make server better then just play it all the time?: What the point of coding a server if your not trying to make it better

Whats your experience in coding: Well I started coding when I joined the game, I have coded for several servers including Devolutionscape, and Scapegoat (Miss you Scapegoat!), etc.

Will you make a successful forums based on rajiscape and moparscape community?: Uhmm, Yes, I believe so?

Will you try and make the forums active as possible?: Psh, That will be the easiest part.

Whats your experience with forums?: I do know how to make very cool forums, and advertise, for a example look at these www.devolution.us.tt I helped wit those… and I can get you a Domain

Will you turn on the server when I am not around?: I will try to keep the server up as long as I possibly can.

Will you be able to do tasks when asked?: I’m a follower

Whats your experience with servers: I have created a few servers, Such as Peacescape, SOTScape, Ddestcscape, etc.

Read full topic
